arts.ttl: Cacereño comeback extends Atlético winning streak amid climb into trophy contention
arts.sum: Since losing to Real Betis on Oct. 27, Atlético have been as close to perfect as possible, winning eight games on the trot across three competitions, including Thursday’s 3-1 comeback triumph over Cacereño in the Copa del Rey. The Rojiblancos have outscored opponents 23-3 in this period, complementing their strong defense with an attack that has finally seemed to click. I had deemed them to be practically out of the running in the league but fast forward to now, and Atlético are five points behind the Catalan outfit with a game in hand and in Europe, they sit in 15 th ahead of the likes of AC Milan, Manchester City, Juventus, PSG and even Real Madrid — not to mention they have clawed that goal difference back to a respectable +2 in just two games.

arts.ttl: PSG draw Atlético de Madrid, Botafogo and Seattle Sounders in Club World Cup group stage

arts.ttl: FIFA Club World Cup 25 draw LIVE: Countdown to the start of the draw
arts.sum: Good evening everybody and welcome to another MARCA in English live blog, this time taking you through the draw for the FIFA Club World Cup for 2025. The game will feature Lionel Messi's Inter Miami, but who they face will be decided on Thursday.

arts.ttl: DAZN secures exclusive Fifa Club World Cup rights
arts.sum: Streaming platform DAZN secures exclusive rights to broadcast next summer's Fifa Club World Cup.

arts.ttl: Charlotte FC close to sealing deal for teenage wonderkid tracked by Atletico Madrid and Arsenal
arts.sum: The MLS side have convinced the Mali U20 international that a move to USA in an up and coming league with more regular game time would be of greater benefit to the development of his career.

arts.ttl: Atlético Madrid star ramps up injury recovery ahead of Sevilla
